name: Smoked Haddock Risotto with Black Pudding & Leek
recipeInstructions: 1. Peel and chop the onions and garlic, and sauté in a pan with a little butter and add the rice and cook for a further 30 seconds, then add the white wine and fish stock.
2. Dice the black pudding and add it to the pan with some thinly sliced leek. Bring back to the boil and simmer gently for about 5 minutes before adding the diced smoked haddock.

3. Cook for a further 4–5 minutes to ensure the rice is cooked, finish with chopped parsley, Mascarpone, grated Parmesan and seasoning. Assembly Serve in a large bowl with grated cheese and olive oil drizzled over the top.
